    • Method Detail

      • checkLegalPlacement

        public boolean checkLegalPlacement(Die d,
                                   int row,
                                   int col)
        Method that check if a certain die can be placed in a certain position of the WindowCard.
        Parameters:
        d - Refers to the die the Player wants to place.
        row - Refers to the row where the Players wants to place the die.
        col - Refers to the column where the Players wants to place the die.
        Returns:
        true if the die can be placed, either way, false is returned.

      • setCell

        public void setCell(Cell c,
                    int row,
                    int col)

      • placeDie

        public void placeDie(Die d,
                     int row,
                     int col)
        Method that lets the Player place a die in a specific position. To make sure that it works properly, checkLegalPlacement is called.
        Parameters:
        d - Refers to the die to be placed.
        row - Refers to the row where the Player wants to place the die.
        col - Refers to the column where the Player wants to place the die.

      • removeDie

        public void removeDie(int row,
                      int col)
        Method that removes a die from a certain position.
        Parameters:
        row - Refers to the row where die to be removed is placed in.
        col - Refers to the column where die to be removed is placed in.

      • getGridCell

        public Cell getGridCell(int row,
                        int col)
        Method that returns a specific cell, given a row and a column.
        Parameters:
        row - Refers to a row of the WindowCard.
        col - Refers to a column of the WindowCard.
        Returns:
        a specific cell, found by row and col.

        public java.lang.String getWindowName()

        public int getDifficulty()

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Method that checks if the WindowCard is empty or not.
        Returns:
        true if the WindowCard is empty, either way, false is returned.
